remarks: Axiom of Regularity.  An axiom of Zermelo-Fraenkel set theory.  Also called the Axiom of Foundation.  A rather non-intuitive axiom that denies more than it asserts, it states (in the form of ~ zfreg ) that every nonempty set contains a set disjoint from itself.  One consequence is that it denies the existence of a set containing itself ( ~ elirrv ).  A stronger version that works for proper classes is proved as ~ zfregs .  (Contributed by NM, 14-Aug-1993.)
statement:
ax-reg $p |- ( E. y y e. x -> E. y ( y e. x /\ A. z ( z e. y -> -. z e. x ) ) ) $.
$d x y z $.
